name: Eric & Yannik 2
description:
Warning! Do not sell this game! Do not sell this game as an NFT!

Robert stole a drill. Eric, Yannik, Gelbhelm, Heike, Groen, Berat, Carlo, or Lorenzo have to kill him.

Menu Controls ↕ Select A Accept Selection
S Go Back / Cancel Selection Gameplay Controls ↔ Horizontal Movement, Dash (While moving on ground, release ↔, then press ↔ before stopping) ↕ Vertical Aiming (Berat only) ↓ Drop A Jump S Shoot P Pause
